metadata.title: CVE-2018-20845 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Division-by-zero vulnerabilities in the functions pi_next_pcrl,pi_next_cprl, and pi_next_rpcl in openmj2/pi.c in OpenJPEG through 2.3.0allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash).

criterions.comment: insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
